title: David Humiliated While Fleeing
summary: As David flees, Ziba deceives him to gain favor, and Shimei curses and throws stones at him. David endures the humiliation, believing God may be using it to humble him. Meanwhile, Absalom enters Jerusalem and takes over Davidâ€™s palace.

faq.question: Who cursed and threw stones at David?
How did David respond to the insults?
faq.answer: He accepted them humbly, believing God may have sent Shimei to rebuke him.
